question: Based on anthropologist Bettina Shell-Duncan’s research, what is the rationale parents maintain for continuing to practice female genital cutting (FGC) on their daughters?

answers.text: It will enable their daughters to acquire high-paying employment.
It will signal to others that their daughters are clean, beautiful, and fit for marriage and childbearing.
Its importance as a rite of passage will strengthen their daughters’ physical and mental resolve.
It will ensure that their daughters can ascend to the highest realm of the afterlife.
